Package org.openpnp.spi

Interface CoordinateAxis

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Axis, Identifiable, Named, PropertySheetHolder, Solutions.Subject, WizardConfigurable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ControllerAxis
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractControllerAxis, AbstractCoordinateAxis, ReferenceControllerAxis, ReferenceVirtualAxis
    public interface CoordinateAxis
extends Axis
    A CoordinateAxis is an axis which can store a coordinate either physically or virtually.

    • Method Detail

      • getCoordinate

        double getCoordinate()
        Returns:
        The coordinate that was last sent to the MotionPlanner either through a moveTo() or other operations, such as homing. This coordinate may not yet be sent to the driver and even less likely reflect the physical machine position. Only after a waitForCompletion() on the MotionPlanner, can you be sure that the coordinate is in sync with the machine. The coordinate is always in AxesLocation.getUnits() i.e. in Millimeters.

      • getLengthCoordinate

        Length getLengthCoordinate()
        Returns:
        The coordinate that was last sent to the MotionPlanner either through a moveTo() or other operations, such as homing. This coordinate may not yet be sent to the driver and even less likely reflect the physical machine position. Only after a waitForCompletion() on the MotionPlanner, can you be sure that the coordinate is in sync with the machine. The coordinate is always in AxesLocation.getUnits() i.e. in Millimeters.

      • coordinatesMatch

        boolean coordinatesMatch​(Length coordinateA,
                         Length coordinateB)
        Parameters:
        coordinateA -
        coordinateB -
        Returns:
        Whether the coordinates match in their native unit length and resolution as determined by the sub-class and possibly by a driver.
